definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for

sentences.english: Some boy scouts from the city were on a camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 一些城市裏來的童子軍孩子們在野外露營。

sentences.english: Aemma and Omsg have camping weekend in Qubec every year.
sentences.chinese: 渥太華中世紀劍會每年都舉行露營週末。

sentences.english: After taps was blown the young campers had to turn out their lights and go to bed.
sentences.chinese: 吹過熄燈號後，那些青年露營者就得熄燈睡覺。

sentences.english: Janet and Maria were on a camping trip at the beach when it suddenly began to rain.
sentences.chinese: 珍娜和瑪麗亞在沙灘上露營時，卻突然下起雨來。

sentences.english: Campers at inland sea in empty quarter.
sentences.chinese: 內海畔，一片空曠區域裏的露營者。

sentences.english: The opinion does not survive experience of a popular Continental camping place.
sentences.chinese: 但這種說法在受人歡迎的歐洲露營地是站不住腳的。

sentences.english: There are also camping areas where people put up temporary cloth homes, called tents.
sentences.chinese: 也有露營區，人們搭起臨時布院，所謂的帳篷。

sentences.english: My class went camping last summer.
Maybe go camping in Scotland, what do you think?
sentences.chinese: 可能去蘇格蘭露營，你覺得怎麼樣？

sentences.english: On their way to the campground, they enjoyed looking at the beautiful mountains and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 往露營地的一路上，他們飽覽了秀麗的湖光山色。

sentences.english: A heavy shower drench the camp ers.
sentences.chinese: 一陣驟雨把露營者都淋溼了。

sentences.english: They have a large campground forested area and go for hikes throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 他們有一個很大的可以散步的森林露營場所。

sentences.english: At its best, camping is a novel, cheap and exciting way to experience the great outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 露營往往是最平宜但刺激的戶外活動。

sentences.english: I encourage my children to attend Memorial Weekend Camping.
sentences.chinese: 我會鼓勵孩子參加國殤假期露營。

sentences.english: And the flickering reflections flung by the camp-fire .
sentences.chinese: 露營地的一切都被大雨淋透了，那堆篝火也給澆滅了。

sentences.english: Suits are decorated in such way that you’ll get the feeling you’re actually camping outside.
sentences.chinese: 套間的設計會讓你恍若真的在室外露營。

definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
to soak in a spa or hot spring
to dawdle/to go slow deliberately/to fizzle out/to have all one's hopes dashed/(Tw) to have a soak in a hot spring
to go for an outing/to go on an excursion
to ride (a bicycle, horse, motorbike etc)/cycling/horseback riding/motorbike riding/a ride/CL:次[ci4]
